# Local Service Booking Platform - Project Setup

## Project Overview
A marketplace platform connecting customers with local service providers (cleaning, lawn care, plumbing, etc.). Service providers pay subscription fees and commission for access to customer leads.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, TypeScript, Sequelize ORM, SQLite (development)
- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Router
- **Authentication**: JWT
- **Payments**: Stripe integration (placeholder)

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/frontend` - React application
